name: Alien Farming
description:
Have you ever wanted to be the first to explore an alien planet? Would you still do it if it was a one way trip?

Those were the questions you had to answer before being selected for this mission. Scans and rovers have discovered alien structures on the planet. They appear to be dormant but can be activated. Your mission is to investigate these structures. There is also evidence of a large teleporter. That may be your ticket home.

Unlock garden plots, grow plants, collect minerals and craft buildings. Explore the world and find a way back home.

Controls
  • Arrow keys: Move
  • W, A, S, D:     Move
  • E:                        Water plants or refill watering can; action key
  • Space:             Pick up and drop plants
  • Q:                       Place landmark
  • Shift:                Run
  • R:                       Set current customer for the scanner
  • C:                       Place currently held building
  • Esc:                   Open game menu
